text: The 2017 NBP President's Cup was the first edition of NBP President's Cup. The tournament was sponsored by National Bank of Pakistan in 2017, as there was no footballing activity in Pakistan since 2016 PFF Cup. The tournament commenced on 17 January and concluded on 26 January. Khan Research Laboratories won the tournament after defeating WAPDA 1–0 in finals. K-Electric won the third place match after defeating Sui Southern Gas 1–0. ==Teams== The 12 teams participating in the tournament are as below: * K-Electric * Karachi United * Karachi Port Trust * Khan Research Laboratories * National Bank * Pakistan Airlines * Pakistan Navy * Pakistan Police * Pakistan Steel * Sui Southern Gas * Sui Northern Gas * WAPDA ==Group stage== ===Group A=== ===Group B=== ===Group C=== ===Group D=== ==Knockout round== ===Quarter-finals=== \---- ===Semifinals=== ===Third place match=== ===Finals=== ===Bracket=== ==Top scorers== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Position !Player !Club !Goals |- |1 |align="left"|Murtaza Hussain |align="left"|Khan Research Laboratories |8 |- |2 |align="left"|Muhammad Rasool |align="left"|K-Electric |7 |- |rowspan=3 |3 |align="left"|Kaleemullah Khan |align="left"|K-Electric |rowspan=3 |3 |- |align="left"|Muhammad Imran |align="left"|Khan Research Laboratories |- |align="left"|Muhammad Lal |align="left"|Sui Southern Gas |- |rowspan=7 |6 |align="left"|Arif Mehmood |align="left"|WAPDA |rowspan=7 |2 |- |align="left"|Hameed Khan |align="left"|Sui Southern Gas |- |align="left"|Maqbool |align="left"|National Bank |- |align="left"|Muhammad Riaz |align="left"|K-Electric |- |align="left"|Noman Dodo |align="left"|Karachi United |- |align="left"|Sada Bahar |align="left"|Sui Northern Gas |- |align="left"|Shakir Lashari |align="left"|Pakistan Airlines |} ==References== ==External links== * 2017 NBP President's Cup FPDC Category:Football competitions in Pakistan Pakistan
